data.title: New Horizon Academy Website
data.meta_description: A truly Christian school that always has the education and welfare of your children as our main focus.
data.text:
Jr. and Sr High (3rd-12th Grade) Sports:

Girls: Volleyball - 5th-12th grades/Peewee VB/BB- 3rd- 6th

Boys: Basketball - 5th-12th grades/Peewee VB/BB- 3rd- 6th

Our elementary volleyball team took state champ in 2021.

Fine Arts:

Elementary: 3rd-6th Took 1st place in 2023!!

Jr. and Sr. High: 7th-12th

Our school competes with other AACS schools in the arts of Bible, music, speech, art, âacademics, and sports.

Our Jr. High has taken first/second place in the years 2011, 2012, 2019, 2020, 2022.

Our Sr. High has taken first/second place in the years 2010, 2012, 2019, 2020, 2022.

Weather:

If schools in our district close due to bad weather, then we will close. Teachers will send âout text messages to parents if we close. We will also announce school closures on âFacebook.

Dress Code:

Preschool Girls: Black or khaki jumpers. Red, black, or white polo shirts. Leggings may be worn during cold weather.

Preschool Boys: Black or khaki pants. Red, black, or white polo shirts. No shorts are allowed during the school year.

K5-2nd Girls: Black or khaki jumpers. Red, black, or white polo shirts. Leggings may be worn during cold weather.

K5-2nd Boys: Black or khaki pants. Red, black, or white polo shirts with appropriate school emblem. No shorts are allowed during the âschool year.

3rd-12th Girls: Black or khaki skirts to the knees. Red, black, or white polo shirts with appropriate school emblem.

3rd-12th Boys: Black or khaki pants. Red, black, or white polo shirts with appropriate school emblem. No shorts are allowed during the âschool year.

Black or red sweatshirts and lightweight jackets, with the school emblem, may be worn in the classroom.

Appropriate heavy jackets may be worn outside.

Girls' skirts must come to the bottom of the kneecap.
